4.title: Technical Stuff

episode of.title: Life of an RC Addict (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: 4th Episode for Season 1. Some of this video has some technical stuff in it. This video does not feel as good as some of the others to me. I feel like I was searching for content and rushing a bit to get it done. I will try harder next time. :-)

5.title: Fixing the Garage Roof

episode of.title: Life of an RC Addict (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: We get in some practice time off roading before the next comp. I take my kids hiking at a place that is nostalgic for me.

6.title: Thanksgiving

episode of.title: Life of an RC Addict (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: Moving rocks, celebrating Thanksgiving, being in a parade, and participating in some truck trials. That's just all part of my life. We also play with 40mph Traxxas Slash and I take 2 in the scaler competition.

7.title: Custom Build Parts

episode of.title: Life of an RC Addict (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: With only 3 weeks instead of 5 to get ready for the competition and work load that nearly killed me, I try to get a few things done and give you a peek into some of my life.

8.title: Bashing in the Snow!

episode of.title: Life of an RC Addict (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: Ryan spend some time playing in the snow with my kids and with the RC trucks. I try to figure out what toasted in the Bug at the last comp and watch the end for some bloopers. I just had fun this time.

9.title: Getting the Bug to Run and Competing

episode of.title: Life of an RC Addict (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: I convert the class 3 Bug over to rear steer using Axial parts. I take 1st in class 3 and 2nd in class 2.

10.title: Transmissions and Cameras

episode of.title: Life of an RC Addict (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot: I rebuild a couple of transmissions and then I build a camera mount for doing trail cams. You can follow the link in the video to get to more videos.

11.title: ROAD TRIP!!

episode of.title: Life of an RC Addict (TV Series 2012– )

11.plot: I take a road trip to Nashville to deliver a car for a friend. I visit friends and family along the way and stop in at Speedweigand Customs. Then at the comp, I blow a locker and end up taking 2nd in both classes.

12.title: Twin Hammers!!! (Breaking Expensive Toys)

episode of.title: Life of an RC Addict (TV Series 2012– )

12.plot: I tear down a Twin Hammers and see what it will do. I give my honest opinion of it at the end. You'll get to see me play with my kids and smash a brand new cell phone.

13.title: Season Finale!!

episode of.title: Life of an RC Addict (TV Series 2012– )

13.plot: I try to destroy a Slash at the track and we participate in the final comp of the season. Such a bittersweet moment. Also, I nearly burn my garage down!.

akas: Life of an RC Addict (United States)
plot: Reality series based around a radio control enthusiast and his friends.
